feed.title: Gaseous Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump gaseous-server/wwwroot/emulators/EmulatorJS from 23660d1 to 049d0e7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/79
  • Removed classes that have been moved to the parser nuget package by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/82
  • Expand the dat file ingestor to handle more formats by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/84
  • Add support for the RetroPie folder structure when building Collections by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/88
  • Update installation documentation to include bare metal installs by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/89
  • Use game title when saving emulator state, and emulator version bump by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/90
  • Surface logs in the UI by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/91
  • Added better support for pre and post database updates by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/92
  • Provide a platform override option during web based import by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/94
  • Documentation update regarding git submodule by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/95
  • Collections can now have games set to be always included or excluded by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/96
  • EmulatorJS version bump by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/97
  • Create codeql.yml by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/100
  • Added forked version of the IGDB nuget package to resolve age rating issue by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/98
  • Added workflow to perform a build on push to master by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/99
  • Added a manual trigger to compile by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/102
  • Fixed incorrect branch name by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/103
  • Add a Platform Map editor to the UI by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/104
  • Platform map bug fix, and default map update by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/105
  • Server logs now write to the database by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/110
  • chore(deps): bump Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design from 7.0.9 to 7.0.10 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/108
  • chore(deps): bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi from 7.0.10 to 7.0.11 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/107
  • chore(deps): bump gaseous-server/wwwroot/emulators/EmulatorJS from 2c172f0 to 4e8d11e by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/109
  • CI update to allow publishing pre-release versions by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/111
  • Update IGDB package by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/112
  • Remove ‘and’ from end of Game Boy BIOS hash by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/116
  • Add internet exposure warning to the README by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/118
  • Signature ingestor database update is now a background task by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/121
  • All uses of hashes should now be lower case by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/122
  • Added EmulatorJS core selection help link by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/124
  • Fail safe when the IGDB connector experiences an exception by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/127
  • Other processes should now be blocked during database upgrade processes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/128
  • Add a list of available cores for each platform to the platform map by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/130
  • chore(deps): EmulatorJS version bump by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/131
  • Fixed incorrect docker command by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/132
  • Resolved error where service status UI was showing all services as blocked by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/134
  • Logs page now has paging by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/136
  • Updated the about page by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/137

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.5.0...v1.6.0

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.6.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Removed import block from LibraryScan by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/150
  • Cache objects from database in memory to improve performance by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/151

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.6.0...v1.6.1

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

What's New

  • Add MariaDB support by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/156
  • Move duplicates out of the import directory and into a duplicates directory - improve logging by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/158
  • Recursively import files in the import directory. Duplicates are now moved to the same path, but in the import errors directory. by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/159
  • Add per platform game counts to the library by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/164
  • Added cleanup and database optimisation by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/168
  • Add m3u support for multi image games by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/171
  • Code clean up and API versioning by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/178
  • Add authentication support by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/185
  • Background task execution intervals are now user configurable by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/209
  • Enhanced firmware availability page by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/213
  • Library filtering and display enhancements by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/214
  • Set paging default to "paged" by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/218
  • Logs now have filtering options by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/219
  • Implement API rate limit handling support by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/227
  • Improve background task progress feedback by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/228
  • Added log correlation and revised background tasks layout by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/230
  • Filter ROMs by platform by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/236
  • A new library scanner process will now be started for each library by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/249
  • Limit library scan workers to four concurrent processes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/250
  • Refactored code, and added Amiga CDTV and CD32, and ColecoVision to the PlatformMap by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/252
  • Save states are now saved to the Gaseous host, making them available anywhere by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/255
  • Migrate to new EJS CDN, and save state tweaks by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/264
  • Add alpha pager, and move main pager to bottom of page by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/265
  • Add enhanced schedule management for background tasks by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/267
  • Added a setting to toggle the emulator debug mode by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/269
  • Add filters for number of rating votes, and release year by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/270
  • Define port 80 as the default port to listen on - overrides new net8.0 default of 8080 by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/281
  • Update documentation by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/283
  • Minor fixes to complete the upgrade from 1.6.1 to 1.7.0 by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/285
  • Added support for custom user avatars by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/288
  • Added game last played, and total play time stats by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/289
  • Integrated EJS 4.0.11 by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/290
  • Add ability to set games/roms as favourite by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/291
  • Create an icon by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/292

Notes

  • Update background task time scheduling to use server local time. Ensure that the TZ variable is passed to the container with the location of the server. by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/268

Bug Fixes

  • Added a try/catch block when unzipping files to ensure errors are properly logged, and temp files are cleaned up by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/165
  • Split LibraryScan and Rematching into separate background tasks by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/166
  • Logs now show date time rather than x hours ago by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/169
  • Minor UI changes, and bug fixes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/173
  • Fixed collection preview load error by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/187
  • Resolved collection build error by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/188
  • Resolved platform mapping form save error by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/189
  • Applied correct database query casing by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/190
  • Include ROM's without a signature match in rematcher efforts by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/191
  • Fixed typo in rematcher code by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/192
  • Apply indexes to improve signature search by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/205
  • Make library scan run once a day rather than every hour by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/206
  • Fix spelling error in logs by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/211
  • Miscellaneous bug fixes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/220
  • Filter controller performance improvements by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/229
  • Resolve a critical error in new logging code by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/231
  • Many queries re-written to improve performance by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/232
  • Overhaul of SQL queries to (hopefully) improve performance with large libraries by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/233
  • Now pre-compiles age group metadata instead of generating it on every query by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/235
  • More performance updates by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/237
  • Add missing indexes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/238
  • Assorted bug fixes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/242
  • More refactoring and bug fixes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/243
  • Improve filter section UX by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/244
  • Remove broken dependency reference by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/246
  • Fixed ROM count and platform display by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/247
  • Many bug and UI fixes, and improved client side caching of images by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/248
  • Collections needs to honour the logged in users age rating permission by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/274
  • .Net8.0 update, add ARM support, various bug fixes by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/277
  • Migrate existing collections to new user on first run after upgrade to 1.7 by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/280
  • Fixed captialisation issue in sql query by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/293

Dependencies

  • chore(deps): bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi from 7.0.11 to 7.0.12 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/160
  • chore(deps): bump MySqlConnector from 2.2.7 to 2.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/182
  • chore(deps): bump gaseous-server/wwwroot/emulators/EmulatorJS from 7c22d03 to 1b3a17f by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/180
  • chore(deps): bump gaseous-server/wwwroot/emulators/EmulatorJS from 1b3a17f to c1a9d9b by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/239
  • chore(deps): bump MySqlConnector from 2.3.1 to 2.3.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/266
  • chore(deps): bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UI from 7.0.13 to 7.0.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/258
  • chore(deps): bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi from 7.0.12 to 7.0.15 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/257
  • chore(deps): bump Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection from 7.0.0 to 8.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/197
  • chore(deps): bump Microsoft.VisualStudio.Web.CodeGeneration.Design from 7.0.10 to 8.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/183

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.6.1...v1.7.0

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Bug Fixes

  • Fix for broken first run on fresh installs by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/297

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.0...v1.7.1

entry.title: New release for Gaseous: v1.7.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

What's New

  • Update for PlatformMap.json to add missing core support by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/318
  • Hide unneeded buttons from the emulator by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/324

Bug Fixes

  • Error on startup when reading value LastRun_BackgroundDatabaseUpgrade by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/319
  • Ensure ROMs are decompressed before loading them into a media group by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/321
  • New library dialog content overruns the edges of the dialog by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/323
  • Infinite Scrolling breaks clicking the Gaseous Games logo to return to library by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/326
  • SQL error when loading the library with the MySQL database server by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/327
  • When fixing matches, search doesn't return the correct values by @michael-j-green in https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/pull/330

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gaseous-project/gaseous-server/compare/v1.7.1...v1.7.2
